description: The ORDER_MEDINFO table is an addendum table for ORDER_MED and enables you to report on detail medication information for each order in clinical system (prescriptions). We have also included patient and contact identification information for each record.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order (prescription) record.

columns.name: MED_LINKED_PROC_ID
columns.description: The linked procedure ID for the medication.  Depending on pharmacy billing configuration, you may have only one procedure ID (code) for all medications or many.

columns.name: MED_CNCT_DAT_REAL
columns.description: The real medication contact date (DAT) used in this order.

columns.name: LAST_ADMIN_INST
columns.description: The last instant that the medication order is administrated in the Medication Administration Record (MAR).

columns.name: NUMBER_OF_DOSES
columns.description: The total number of doses of the medication order that should be given to the patient.

columns.name: DOSES_REMAINING
columns.description: The total number of the medication order which has not been given to patient.

columns.name: RESUME_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The resume status.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Default Action (Determined by configuration)


Will not be resumed


Resumed (Default)


Auto-Discontinued


Will be resumed


Modified


New


No Change (pending)


No Change

columns.name: MIN_RATE
columns.description: The minimum rate number.

columns.name: MAX_RATE
columns.description: The maximum rate number.

columns.name: RATE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The rate unit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: MIN_DURATION
columns.description: The minimum duration.

columns.name: MAX_DURATION
columns.description: The maximum duration.

columns.name: MIN_VOLUME
columns.description: The minimum volume.

columns.name: MAX_VOLUME
columns.description: The maximum volume.

columns.name: VOLUME_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The volume unit of measure associated with the order.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: CALC_VOLUME_YN
columns.description:
Indicate if the volume is calculated.  "Y" means the volume is calculated. "N" means the volume is not calculated.  Default is "Y".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: STABILITY
columns.description: The stability value.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The ID of the medication prescribed for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_SUPP_MED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the medication is patient-supplied.  'N' indicates the med is not supplied by the patient. 'Y' indicates the medication is supplied by the patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_VOLUME_YN

columns.name: PAT_SUPP_DOSES
columns.description: Specifies the number of doses the patient supplies if the medication is patient supplied.

columns.name: CALC_MIN_DOSE
columns.description: The minimum calculated administer dose.

columns.name: CALC_MAX_DOSE
columns.description: The maximum calculated administer dose.

columns.name: CALC_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dose unit for calculated administer dose.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: CALC_DOSE_INFO
columns.description: The calculation steps to get calculated administer dose from the ordered dose.

columns.name: ADMIN_MIN_DOSE
columns.description: The minimum administer dose.

columns.name: ADMIN_MAX_DOSE
columns.description: The maximum administer dose.

columns.name: ADMIN_DOSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The dose unit for administer dose.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: DONOT_DISP_YN
columns.description:
Indicate if the medication is not dispensed.  'N' indicates the medication is dispensed. 'Y' indicates the medication is not dispensed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_VOLUME_YN

columns.name: DONOT_DISP_DOSE
columns.description: It is to specify the number of doses which will not be dispensed if the DONOT_DISP_YN column is 'Y' for Yes.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ORDERING_DATE
columns.description: The date the order was placed  in calendar format.

columns.name: ORDER_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The order class category ID for the prescription, used to determine how the clinical system processes the order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal

columns.name: CONC_NAME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The concentration of this order (used only for fixed ratio mixture orders).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LET_EXPIRE_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who marked order as Let Expire.

columns.name: TIME_LET_EXPIRE
columns.description: The time when the physician marked the order as Let Expire.

columns.name: EXP_AFT_START_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the order will expire, based on the amount of time a physician entered for the order to expire after the start time.

columns.name: EXP_BEF_END_TIME
columns.description: The date and time the order will expire, based on the amount of time a physician entered for the order to expire before the end time.

columns.name: ORD_COPIED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The order copy status: If the order has been copied to another encounter or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Copied


Copied to Other Encounter


Do not allow Copy

columns.name: ORDER_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Where in the system the order was placed from.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Admission Navigator


Transfer Navigator


Discharge Navigator


Clinician Orders


Order Entry


OrderSet


CUSTOM


Web

columns.name: DFLT_DISCRETE_FREQ_NAME
columns.description:
A flag to indicate if this order should default discrete ambulatory medication frequency information.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: DFLT_DISCRETE_DOSE_NAME
columns.description:
A flag to indicate if this order should default discrete ambulatory medication dose information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DFLT_DISCRETE_FREQ_NAME

columns.name: REV_ORD_GRANU_YN
columns.description:
Determines if an order is reviewed by day or by instant


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


By Instant


By Day

columns.name: EXP_DAYS_YN
columns.description:
Determines if an expiring order is by days or by instant


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: REV_ORD_GRANU_YN

columns.name: MED_CONTACT_DT
columns.description: This is the order contact date in human readable form.

columns.name: DOSE_CALC_WARNING
columns.description: Contains the dose warning generated when the order was entered or verified.

columns.name: MIXTURE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the mixture type if the medication order is a mixture. This column will be empty if the medication is not a mixture.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Mixture


TPN


Combination

columns.name: MED_DURATION_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The duration unit.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Minutes


Hours


Days

columns.name: TPN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The total parenteral nutrition (TPN) infusion site.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Central


Peripheral


Umbilical

columns.name: STABILITY_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The stability unit.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MED_DURATION_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: DISP_INDIV_YN
columns.description:
Indicate if the ingredients are dispensed individually. 'N' indicates the ingredients are dispensed together. 'Y' indicates the ingredients are dispensed individually.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CALC_VOLUME_YN

columns.name: MR_IS_PERSISTENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this order is set to persist after the encounter is closed. Yes indicates the order will not be discontinued; No or blank indicates it will be discontinued.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: MAR_ADMIN_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Used for performance to determine the administration type of the order.  This gets set once the order has been administered.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Infusion

columns.name: ORD_COMP_YN
columns.description:
This item determines whether an order is completed or not.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MR_IS_PERSISTENT_YN

columns.name: RATE_CALC_INFO
columns.description: Stores the rate calculation info.

columns.name: RATE_CALC_WARNING
columns.description: Contains the rate warning generated when the order was entered or verified.

columns.name: DFLT_DISCRETE_C_NAME
columns.description:
A flag to indicate if this order�should default discrete ambulatory medication information.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DFLT_DISCRETE_FREQ_NAME

columns.name: PT_SIG_SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the SmartText record used to generate medication instructions for the patient based on order details. A SmartText record is a text template that can contain text and dynamic data.

columns.name: PT_SIG_SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: DISPENSABLE_MED_ID
columns.description: This is the unique ID of the medication that is the order's dispensable product. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_MEDICATION table.  We recommend using this column in place of other similar columns to report on medication orders. Other columns that contain a medication ID in ORDER_MED and its addendum tables can contain orderable records or templates that do not represent real medications.  When Intelligent Medication Selection (IMS) runs for an order, this column will choose the medication record evaluated for IMS rather than the IMS mixture template.

columns.name: TIMELY_THRESHOLD
columns.description: Number of minutes between the scheduled time for an administration and the actual time given before the administration is considered Late/Early. This is a calculated value specific to each order, derived from settings in the ordered medication, ordered frequency, and System Definitions.

columns.name: IS_FAM_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this order is ordered as a Facility-Administered Medication (FAM). 1 indicates the order is a FAM and will not be discontinued on closing the encounter; 0 or blank indicates it will be discontinued.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MR_IS_PERSISTENT_YN

columns.name: ONE_STEP_MED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the order is a one-step medication, a medication whose administration is documented in one step.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: MR_IS_PERSISTENT_YN

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the authorization status of the order when it is released from a treatment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Pending Review


Denied


Expired


Unknown

columns.name: REFERRAL_AUTH_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The referral status category ID of the order record when it is activated.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Open


Pending Review


Canceled


Denied


Closed


New Request


Incomplete

columns.name: RECIPE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The recipe quantity amount for a ratio-based mixture medication (a medication which consists of a drug diluted in a base at a fixed concentration).

columns.name: RECIPE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The med & dose unit category ID for the recipe quantity for a ratio-based mixture medication.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RATE_UNIT_C_NAME

columns.name: ADMIN_INSTRUCTIONS_CHANGE_DTTM
columns.description: Tracks the instant when the administration instructions were changed from their system default.

columns.name: ADDL_DUES_REMAINING
columns.description: The count of due times that need to be accounted for before the order can be considered complete, in addition to those that represent ordered due times.

columns.name: HAS_COMPONENT_DATA_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for whether this order has any nutritional component data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes, IP 


Yes, OP


Yes, IP Lipid for TPN


Yes, OP Lipid for TPN


Yes, IP TPN


Yes, OP TPN
